author: dan131riley
body: Remove the use of calls to Reflex in Validation/Tools, replace with TClass calls that work with ROOT6.  Correctly handle the case of functions hidden by a function with a different signature in a derived class,  corrects a couple of bad search/replace errors where Bill used "::" instead of ".".  Old version was broken, so no conceivable impact to these fixes.  Still no tests.
title: Remove use of Reflex, replace with TClass calls that work with ROOT6
